concept.title: Getting Started
concept.shortdesc: You can access Eucalyptus using a command line interface, Euca2ools, or by a graphic interface, the User Console.

conbody.p: To access Eualyptus you need keys for Euca2ools and a password for the Console. To request access, talk to your cloud administrator. For more information about Euca2ools, see . For more information about the User Console, see .
